titles.title: A resolution expressing support for the designation of March 9, 2018, as a national day of remembrance in honor of the life, legacy, and many accomplishments of Billy Frank, Jr.
A resolution expressing support for the designation of March 9, 2018, as a national day of remembrance in honor of the life, legacy, and many accomplishments of Billy Frank, Jr.

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: Expresses supports for a national day of remembrance in honor of the life, legacy, and accomplishments of Billy Frank, Jr.
